title: The Opener: Blue Jays, Dodgers Face Off in Game 1 of the World Series - MLB Trade Rumors

scene_plan.wide_context: [Open with a sweeping shot of the MLB Stadium, showcasing fans in anticipation and setting up for Game 1. The camera zooms into Lee627 standing at center stage.]
scene_plan.impact_close: [Cut to close-up shots as Lee627 calmly discusses Blue Jays roster decisions with a sense of urgency, highlighting key players and their roles in the game ahead.]

scene_plan.data_overlay: [Overlay text on screen: 'Blue Jays vs. Dodgers - Game 1 Stats', displaying live stats relevant to roster decisions such as player positions, injuries, and recent performance metrics.]

sora_prompt.voice_over: <Lee627's calm voice narrates: 'As the Blue Jays prepare for their World Series opener against the Dodgers later today, roster decisions are crucial. With key players returning from injury and others battling fatigue, manager Ryne Sandberg must balance experience with fresh talent to maximize potential on this historic night.'>
sora_prompt.outro: [The scene fades out as Lee627 looks directly at the camera invitingly for viewers to comment below.]
